sections.heading: value-based selection process, defined
sections.text: Best value-based selection process means a process of selecting a design-builder using price, schedule, and qualifications for evaluation factors.SourceLaws 2018, LB775, ยง 5.

37-1704.Best value-based selection process, defined.

Best value-based selection process means a process of selecting a design-builder using price, schedule, and qualifications for evaluation factors.

SourceLaws 2018, LB775, ยง 5.
